official_title: A Comparison of NETSPOT Imaging Versus F-FDG-PET in Head and Neck Cancer Patients
inclusion_criteria:
Patients with suspected or diagnosed HNSCC undergoing planned 18F FDG PET/CT at the time of primary diagnosis or after completion of treatment.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: Inability to undergo 18F-FDG-PET/CT imaging due to medical comorbidities
